room_title: Escape room "Tin Star Saloon" by Escape Room Marlton in Collingswood
review: We have done about 9 different escape rooms already and this one ranks up there at the top! The two of us did the Heist and got out with a few minutes to spare. This room is really well put together, the clues are solid, all of the mechanics in the room worked well, and the staff was super nice! We will definitely be returning to do all of the other rooms soon.

room_title: Escape room "Tin Star Saloon" by Escape Room Marlton in Collingswood
review: We were a group of four first-time escapers and had a great time in the Heist room! We successfully escaped! Thank you for the experience, we will definitely be back to try another room soon.

room_title: Escape room "Tin Star Saloon" by Escape Room Marlton in Collingswood
review: Just went for the second time, we did The Secret Agent room a year ago today, and did The Heist Room. Both visits were wonderful experiences. The staff is wonderful. I can't wait to go back and would recommend this to anyone looking to try something new!
